Vitthāra Sutta：1．Vitthāra Sutta． The five indriyas，if completely cultivated，lead to arahantship； in lesser degree to lower attainments．S．v．201f．

2．Vitthāra Sutta．A detailed account of deeds which are dark with dark result，bright with bright result，dark and bright with mixed results，neither dark nor bright the last leading to non doing．A．ii．230f．
